info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broadwater and west central Meagher Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 225 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles east of East Helena, or 21 miles north of Townsend, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Broadwater and west central Meagher Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
